system.sustained:
The Ability to Send and Receive Astropathic messages across interstellar distances. To receive signal within range is Psynscience test with +10 if prepared, +0 if not, and -20 if distracted, additional -20 if out of range.
Sending Distance affects Sending Time, Minimum Psy Rating, and Test Difficulty:  (To Orbit, Instant, Psy 2, +20), (Nearby In-System, 1d5 Rounds, Psy 2, +10), (Distant In-System, 1d10 Rounds, Psy 3, +0),  (Nearby System, 1d10 Minutes, Psy 6, -10), (Sub Sector, 1d5 Hours, Psy 10, -20), (Sector, 1d5 Weeks, Psy 15, -30), (Segmentum, 1d5 Months, Psy 18, -30).
